# File lib/midilib/io/seqwriter.rb, line 18
    def write_to(io)
        @io = io
        @bytes_written = 0
        write_header()
        @update_block.call(nil, @seq.tracks.length, 0) if @update_block
        @seq.tracks.each_with_index { | track, i |
            write_track(track)
            @update_block.call(track, @seq.tracks.length, i) if @update_block
        }
    end
